item.title: Setup Hugo Blog
item.description:
I’m starting a new blog to share my technical knowledge, hosted on GitHub Pages. I chose Hugo as the static site generator along with the elegant Clarity theme. Let me walk you through the setup process:

Hugo CMS

Download and install Hugo CLI

Create the Hugo blog directory using Hugo CLI:

hugo new site quickstart
cd quickstart
git init
git submodule add https://github.com/chipzoller/hugo-clarity themes/clarity
echo theme = "'clarity' >> hugo.toml"
hugo server
